metadata.title: RZ/A1H, RZ/A1M, RZ/A2M: IMR/OpenVG related software

sections.content:
Question:
 What is the support status of IMR/OpenVG related software?
Answer:
Support for IMR/OpenVG related software has been discontinued.
However, if you agree to no support from Renesas, we can provide the related software.
Please contact us via Renesas sales for the offer.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1H, RZ/A1M, RZ/A2M
